mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(noticeno, title, notice, nfile, noticedate, passwd ,masterno) VALUES(notice_seq.nextval, #{title},#{notice},#{nfile},sysdate,#{passwd},#{masterno})
mapper.select: SELECT noticeno, title, notice, nfile, noticedate, passwd ,masterno FROM notice ORDER BY noticeno DESC

SELECT noticeno, title, notice, nfile, noticedate, passwd ,masterno FROM notice
WHERE (UPPER(title) Like '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(notice) Like '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%')
ORDER BY noticeno DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM notice
WHERE (UPPER(title) Like '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(notice) Like '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%')
